Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent

Class IterativeParallelism

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.trofimov.concurrent.IterativeParallelism
All Implemented Interfaces:
info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.AdvancedIP, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.ListIP, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.ScalarIP
public class IterativeParallelism extends Object implements info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.AdvancedIP
Runs in parallel task on List using main function parallelizeFunction(int, List, Function, Function), which accepts number of threads to parallel on. Class implements AdvancedIP interface, may be specified parallelMapper. If parallelMapper is specified, than class uses it to make task in parallel.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.AdvancedIP

    • parallelizeFunction

      private <E, R> R parallelizeFunction(int threads, List<E> list, Function<Stream<E>,R> f, Function<Stream<R>,R> reducer) throws InterruptedException
      Main function for parallelize given task f on list, after applying function for all elements, reduces them, using reducer. If parallelMapper is null, then is creates threads by itself, else it uses parallelMapper.
      Type Parameters:
      E - type of list elements
      R - type of result
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads
      list - data
      f - function which applies to each element of list
      reducer - function which collects results in different threads
      Returns:
      result of applying function and reducing result
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if Thread throws it

    • getReducer

      private <T> Function<Stream<T>,T> getReducer(info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.concurrent.AdvancedIP.Monoid<T> monoid)
      Function, which returns lambda for reducing stream using given monoid monoid.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of monoid and Stream
      Parameters:
      monoid - monoid for reducer
      Returns:
      returns lambda, which reduces stream into one value

      values - given array to which applies monoid
